## Introduction

Dukto is a free and open-source software that allows users to share files across different devices and networks. The software was designed to make file sharing easy and hassle-free. With Dukto, you can quickly transfer files between two or more devices, regardless of the operating system or network configuration.

## Features

### Multi-Platform Support

One of the significant advantages of Dukto is its multi-platform support. The software is compatible with Windows, Linux, and Mac OS X, making it easy to share files between devices running on different operating systems.

### Easy-to-Use Interface

Dukto's interface is simple and straightforward, making it easy for anyone to use the software. To transfer files, all you need to do is drag and drop them onto the recipient's avatar, and voila! The transfer will begin immediately.

### Group Sharing

Dukto also supports group sharing, which means you can share files with multiple recipients at once. This feature is especially useful for sharing files with colleagues or classmates, as you can quickly send files to everyone in the group without having to transfer them individually.

### No Network Configuration Required

Another advantage of Dukto is that it doesn't require any network configuration. The software auto-discovers other devices on the same network and allows you to transfer files without any hassle.

## How to Use Dukto

Using Dukto is straightforward. Here's a quick guide on how to get started:

1. Download and install Dukto on all devices you wish to share files with.
2. Launch the software on all devices.
3. On the device you wish to send files from, drag and drop the files onto the recipient's avatar.
4. The transfer will begin immediately, and you'll be able to see the progress on both devices.

## Conclusion

Dukto is a must-have software for anyone who needs to transfer files between different devices and networks regularly. It's easy to use, supports multiple platforms, and doesn't require any network configuration, making it an excellent tool for both professionals and casual users alike.
